text: Naomi Piqué (born 12 June 2000) is a Dutch-born Surinamese footballer who plays as a right winger. She is a member of the Dutch Eredivisie club SBV Excelsior and the Suriname women's national team. ==Club career== Piqué started her career with FC Delta Sports 95. She has played for ADO Den Haag in the Netherlands. After three seasons she moved to Excelsior in 2020. With the contract she became officially a professional football, but received a minimum amount of compensation fees. ==International career== Piqué made her debut for the Surinamese national team at the 2022 CONCACAF Championships qualification. After the competition, on the way back home, she was left together with two other players at the airport in Puerto Rico without a valid flight ticket, money and hotel stay. The three women started a boycot and didn’t want to compete for the national team with the current management anymore. The boycot received media attentention. Piqué was during this situation in the media explaining what happened and how the situation progressed. ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Surinamese sportspeople Category:Female footballers Category:Sportspeople from Utrecht (city) Category:Dutch footballers
title: Naomi Piqué
